title: Cappuccino Swirls at Mars' South Pole
description: Swirls of chocolate, caramel and cream – this image is definitely one to trigger sweet-toothed cravings. Smooth cream-coloured plateaus surrounded by cocoa-dusted ridges interspersed with caramel-hued streaks create a scene reminiscent of a cosmic cappuccino.

theme.name: MARS
theme.description: The Red Planet, one of the most desirable destinations for humanity
